Articles.Content:
For anyone who knows of the amazing creations Zokesia Skunkworks produce you may have noticed they do not have very many videos of there crafts in action which might make some people a little hesitant to download. So we here at ZS have decided to give you all what you may want! A showcase thread which will demonstrate all of our creations with commentary!

Now before I go any farther please contain your excitement! For any of you who need a link to Zokesia Skunkworks home page to look at downloading these crafts here ya go: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/24534-Stock-Rocket-Builder-Zokesia-Skunkworks-%28NOW-HIRING!%29

So if you want to find a craft I have reviewed which the name is just above the video and in the video, go to the link above and just scroll down the list, I'm sure you can find it.

Also one last note, all of these video's are in a playlist on my youtube channel, so if you want to watch them all in a row, I have tried to make that a bit easier to do so! http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLShmYHz1t9eRxd2G7hvP-odhEqbBjpGq7&feature=mh_lolz

Will get to those as soon as I can and update the original post as more video's are uploaded
ok cool! thanks!

About the parachutes on the WT-25, it's a remnant from the early emergency system I used back then, have since improved the system so it can save the entire plane. I think the 21 and 19 has the improved one.

About the parachutes on the WT-25, it's a remnant from the early emergency system I used back then, have since improved the system so it can save the entire plane. I think the 21 and 19 has the improved one.

Yes as i recall the 25 was your first upload, so it's a bit rusty but nevertheless a brilliant plane.
Up dated thread, with Lunacy 8 and X series remember folks, don't forget to read the description!

wow really good man!

and you pronounce "Zokesia" Zoh-Key-Syuh....

You should also check out my plane, Gargouille 1 (pronounced "Gargoyle 1"), which is the rival fighter of the KiG-19 Fishhook. Gargouille 1 needs a bit of upwards trim, and (possibly) some rightwards trim. If its wings seem to "flap" at high speeds, don't worry.. Word of warning: It is highly recommended that you DO NOT fly Gargouille 1 while in time-warp, because the wings bend further than they're built to when you do. 2x is pushing it, 3x or 4x, and it may rip itself apart. Known top landing speed is between 50 and 60 m/s, although, be very careful when landing with the nose first, because the engine has a tendency to break off when the tail end lands too hard. Zekes, if you'd be so kind as to link Gargouille 1, that would be greatly appreciated.
Alright man, I'll get to it, right now I'm just going down the list on the main release page.

Yeah I though i did.. it is here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/31397-The-Cereal-Box-Industries-NOW-HIRING?p=420942&viewfull=1#post420942

like the videos.

cool seeing ship i haven't flown before because there are a lot.
So, are there any ways I need to improve the videos or are you guys satisfied?
you could do i grading system on each craft. like 1-10 on category's like speed,handling,looks,part count,maneuverability, and any others you could think of.

you could do i grading system on each craft. like 1-10 on category's like speed,handling,looks,part count,maneuverability, and any others you could think of.

I like that idea. like show the stats at the end of the video.
Alright, next video I make will have that implemented, although it might be a few days before a new video is out, Zekes I told you why I have a hard time with recording haha, my apologies
no problem

you sure do have your work cut out for you as of the moment i just counted all the craft we have (including individual crafts in the bundles) and we have a total of 110. i just realized we have a lot of stuff

Really?... Well, I'm just going to ask they are all linked in the OP of ZS

Hello guys! I know its been almost a month since this thread was update with a new video but guess what!? We got a new video as of this moment up and ready to watch and three more soon to be put up on that list! Enjoy!

Also just to let you all know, the latest video is not embedded but a link is provided ( at the bottom ) due to forum rules of a maximum of only 5 embedded videos per post, sorry.

It says the last video is currently being processed and so is currently unviewable....
